New Records: Jasprit Bumrah and Arshdeep Singh each took 3 wickets
Key Match Events: Rashid Khan and Fazalhaq Farooqi took 3 wickets apiece for Afghanistan
Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma were dismissed by Rashid Khan
Shivam Dube was lbw to Rashid Khan
Pre-Game Insights: India won the toss and opted to bat first
Rohit Sharma said India will bat first and set a target due to the pitch being batter-friendly
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma said that winning the match was a good total to chase
Suryakumar Yadav said that he enjoyed batting from 7-15 overs and taking charge of the innings
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Kensington Oval in Bridgetown, Barbados
India maintained their unbeaten record in the tournament
